title: Chrest from a chest?
body:
I have no idea what happened, and can't find whatever i got (i think it was a chrest), anywhere. 

I opened a chest, got 150 orange essense and what i thought was a chrest, but i can't find it and nothing on google iether. 

Anyone know what i got?

replies.body: C H R E S T

I looked into this for you, and it looks like you unlocked the Bilgewater Crest summon icon!  You may need to scroll down your list of summon icons a bit to see it, since it's not sorted by date unlocked.  Hope that helps clear things up, and grats!
Bilgewater chrest? But its not with my icons etc.
